section.title: Overview
section.p: Buckets are entities defining an amount and unit of consumption. The bucket is defined with a name to be referenced by the tariff and charging service. It is a reusable entity and same bucket definition can be used by multiple charging services.

note.p: It must always be associated with a charging service.

section.p: A bucket is defined with a size and unit type. A unit type can be of TIME, VOLUME, MONEY, SERVICE_SPECIFIC (for example, number of SMS) type.
